Version 1.7.15 - Fix Role Cleanup & Company Search

Critical fixes for system-level role cleanup and company search functionality

Bug Fixes:

  • Role Cleanup: Fixed broken upgrade steps (v1.7.1/v1.7.3) that called non-existent function
  • Aggressive Cleanup: Removes ALL system-level editingteacher and student roles
  • Company Search: Fixed search bar using document-level event delegation (same as user search)

Technical Changes:

  • Commented out broken function calls in db/upgrade.php (lines 742, 763)
  • Added v1.7.15 upgrade step with aggressive system-level role removal
  • companyaccess.js now uses $(document).on() pattern like userselection.js
  • All event handlers use document delegation for robust timing

Why this matters:

Previous versions had a bug where upgrade steps called a function that didn't exist, causing upgrades to fail. This left system-level teacher/student roles assigned, which breaks IOMAD's company context handling. This version fixes both issues.
